class.comment: Represents an entity that can equip a Saddle.

return.comment: Whether the entity can be saddled.

isSaddleable.comment: Checks if the entity can be saddled.

params.name: sound
params.comment: The sound to play when equipping the saddle.

equipSaddle.comment: Equips a saddle on the entity.

return.comment: The default sound event to play when equipping the saddle.

getSaddleSoundEvent.comment: Gets the default sound event to play when equipping the saddle.

isSaddled.comment: Checks if the entity currently has a saddle equipped.
